text:
Cryptopolitan is an independent publication online related to cryptocurrency and blockchain.
History.
The news portal was founded in 2013 and the offices are located in the UK and India. It covers news content, reviews, technical analysis, price analysis and insights on bitcoin, top altcoins, blockchain projects, crowd sales, regulatory developments etc. in the blockchain and crypto space. Approved by Google as a reliable provider of blockchain and crypto news, it has audiences in the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Canada, India, Netherlands, Germany, South Africa, Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, France, Turkey, Nigeria, Spain, Italy, Brazil, Romania etc.
It has often been quoted by Coinstats.com, TradingView.com, CryptoCompare.com, SmartNews.com, Ecosystem.com, Cryptocontrol.io, Coinna.com, Quora.com, MuckRack.com, and other news aggregators.
